description: This is the schema the declarative property renderer templates (in JSON format) must adhere to. The Apollo audit check validates all propertyRendererTemplates View Model JSON files against this schema. For explanation of the keywords of this schema, please visit https://ajv.js.org/keywords.html

grids.description: List of table grid ids to apply this template to. If empty, applies template to all tables

columns.description: List of column names to apply this property renderer template to.

tooltip.description: List of properties to be shown as tooltips when hovering over a cell in the columns listed in columns

template.description: Inline HTML template code to apply to cells in the columns listed in columns

templateUrl.description: HTML file path to apply as a template to cells in the columns listed in columns

renderFunction.description: Function to apply to cells in the columns listed in columns

deps.description: File path where the render function or header component is located in

dependentServices.description: List of service files that need to be injected/used in template implementation.

headerTemplate.description: Inline HTML template code to apply to the header of the columns listed in columns

headerTemplateUrl.description: HTML file path to apply as a template to the header of the columns listed in columns

headerRenderFunction.description: Function to apply to the header of the columns listed in columns

headerComponent.description: A component to render the header of the table
